name: (UPDATED!!)NinjaParkour(Windows and Mac(Test))
description:
MAC OS ONLY WORK IF YOU ALLOW DOWNLOADS FROM ANYWHERE BY:

DISABLING THE GATEKEEPER:

OPENING TERMINAL AND TYPING , (sudo spctl --master-disable)

THIS LETS YOU DOWNLOAD FROM ANYWHERE MEANING LETTING YOU DOWNLOAD MY GAME!

-Whats New:

  • Added music to spice up the game ;)
  • Fixed volume slider not working between levels.
  • Added remote text that i can remotley change so specify the version number
  • fixed a few bugs
  • redo the level selection machanic.(some levels are locked until you do a level)
  • extra bugs fixed

Parkour and grapple your way through the levels.

Reach The End To win

Ill be adding multiplayer and more levels soon.
